publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2061# Shona Robison: Euro 2008—That the Parliament supports the campaign to have Dundee included as a venue in the bid for the finals of the 2008 European Nations Championships; urges the Executive to support the principle of locating a number of stadia outwith the central belt of Scotland, and believes that the Scottish Premier League should relax its rules on clubs sharing grounds.
S1M-2061# Euro 2008 (lodged on 3 July 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2061# Euro 2008 (lodged on 3 July 2001) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2061# Euro 2008 (lodged on 3 July 2001) Colin Campbell*

S1M-2061# Shona Robison: Euro 2008—That the Parliament supports the campaign to have Dundee included as a venue in the bid for the finals of the 2008 European Nations Championships; urges the Executive to support the principle of locating a number of stadia outwith the central belt of Scotland, and believes that the Scottish Premier League should relax its rules on clubs sharing grounds. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell
S1M-2061# Euro 2008 (lodged on 3 July 2001) Brian Adam*

S1M-2061# Shona Robison: Euro 2008-That the Parliament supports the campaign to have Dundee included as a venue in the bid for the finals of the 2008 European Nations Championships; urges the Executive to support the principle of locating a number of stadia outwith the central belt of Scotland, and believes that the Scottish Premier League should relax its rules on clubs sharing grounds. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Brian Adam
S1M-2061# Euro 2008 (lodged on 3 July 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-2061# Shona Robison: Euro 2008—That the Parliament supports the campaign to have Dundee included as a venue in the bid for the finals of the 2008 European Nations Championships; urges the Executive to support the principle of locating a number of stadia outwith the central belt of Scotland, and believes that the Scottish Premier League should relax its rules on clubs sharing grounds. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson

S1M-2061# Shona Robison: Euro 2008-That the Parliament supports the campaign to have Dundee included as a venue in the bid for the finals of the 2008 European Nations Championships; urges the Executive to support the principle of locating a number of stadia outwith the central belt of Scotland, and believes that the Scottish Premier League should relax its rules on clubs sharing grounds. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson

S1M-2061# Shona Robison: Euro 2008-That the Parliament supports the campaign to have Dundee included as a venue in the bid for the finals of the 2008 European Nations Championships; urges the Executive to support the principle of locating a number of stadia outwith the central belt of Scotland, and believes that the Scottish Premier League should relax its rules on clubs sharing grounds. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Colin Campbell, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson
